message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. Can you consider this price?
